content: in this legal case a court ruling was made by the grosseto tribunal on april 14 2020 the ruling declared the legitimate opening of a succession and determined the distribution of the estate among the heirs the court dissolved the communal property and assigned specific properties to each heir it also ordered the payment of sums of money between the heirs the court considered various articles of the civil code to support its decision the case was initiated by one of the heirs who requested the dissolution of the communal inheritance and the inclusion of certain donations in the division the defendants opposed the application and argued for their rights in the family business a courtappointed technical expert provided a report on the value of the estate and assets involved the court also took into account mortgages on the properties and the claims of a thirdparty intervener the court determined the shares and assigned specific properties to each heir considering the collation of donations it ordered the payment of sums of money between the heirs and involved the tax authorities as creditors the court also addressed the issue of interest and awarded full compensation for the costs of the litigation the ruling was made on april 14 2020 by the judge in grosseto
